short_summary: Custom Combining at Brandon Research and Development Centre
description: The project uttlaze to provide the work which include all labor material supply  fuel equipment and supervision to custom combine lover the work will ty be 50 acres of Barley, 360 acres of wheat, 130 acres of peas, 255 acres of soybeans, 80 acres of corn and 580 acres of canola custom combined at the 4 sites operated by BRDC to determine, supply all labor material fuel equipment and supervision necessary to custom combine approximately 1,500 acres of various varieties of crop at the BRDC. Provide accurate and there mapped yield and moisture information. it is included in the description on pge 7
